text: sillo hananimkke iss-eo jong-gyoneun iseullam-ila. seongseoleul bad-eun jadeul-i uigyeon-eul dalliham-eun ojig geudeul-ege jisig-i dolaehan ihuloseo geudeul saie peojin jeogdaesim ttaemun-ila. hananim-ui jingpyoleul bulsinhaneun jaga issdamyeon sillo hananimkkeseoneun gyesanham-e gajang ppaleusin bun-ila
